name: Unstable Orbit
description:
UNSTABLE ORBIT

Launch some asteroids, see if they stay in orbit and feel the mayhem!

HOW TO PLAY

  • Left mouse press & drag to launch an asteroid
  • You may change the simulation speed by pressing an arrow key on top of the HUD.

CREDITS
I created this project alone for GMTK GAMEJAM 2020. Most of my effort went in programming and game design. I outsourced most of the in game assets including sprites, audios and ui-graphics.

ASSETS

  • Music: https://freesound.org/people/Magntron/sounds/335571/
  • UI graphics: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/simple-free-pixel-art-styled-...
  • Planet image: https://opengameart.org/content/planet-0
  • Rock image: https://opengameart.org/content/rocks
  • Sounds (Paid): https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256
